official_title: Enabling Remote Access to Breathe Easier: A Novel Approach to Improve Symptom Self-Management and Wellness for Survivors of Lung Cancer and Their Family Members
inclusion_criteria:
* Must be a White or African-American survivor of NSCLC, stages I-III, have access to a smart phone, have internet access, and be willing and able to use a mobile application and participate in daily meditations/gentle movement exercises for 8-weeks.
Healthy volunteers allowed
exclusion_criteria: * Persons not meeting all inclusion criteria will be excluded.
